schemaDescription:
A list of bank transactions. Each 'txns' field is a list of data arrays with schema: [transactionAmount, transactionNarration, transactionDate, transactionType (1 for CREDIT, 2 for DEBIT, 3 for OPENING, 4 for INTEREST, 5 for TDS, 6 for INSTALLMENT, 7 for CLOSING and 8 for OTHERS), transactionMode, currentBalance].
 We currently have have only last two month transaction, older transaction are coming soon...

txns: LOAN DISBURSAL - HDFC BANK - AUTO LOAN
